pageLoad.title: Page Load Event
pageLoad.template:
# Page Load Event

## Implementation

```javascript
window.adobeDataLayer.push({
  event: "pageLoaded",
  eventInfo:
    "This and 'event' are removed when getState is called so won't show in XDM",
  xdm: {
    web: {
      webPageDetails: {
        pageViews: {
          value: 1,
        },
        name: "<page_name>",
        URL: document.location.href,
        server: document.location.origin,
        siteSection: "<site_section>",
        _telus: {
          accessMotion: "<access_motion>",
          accessVoice: "<access_voice>",
          accountRole: "<account_role>",
          adobeDataLayerBuilder: "alloyAnalytics", // if using starter kit, otherwise use "custom"
          banCount: "<ban_count>",
          banType: "<ban_type>",
          billCycleEnd: "<bill_cycle_end_date>",
          billCycleStart: "<bill_cycle_start_date>",
          catalogueType: "<article_type>",
          colophonID: "<colophon_id>",
          customPageViews: 1,
          customSiteSection: "<site_section>",
          dataLayerType: "acdl",
          dataRemaining: "<data_remaining>",
          dataTotal: "<data_total>",
          dataUsed: "<data_used>",
          daysRemaining: "<days_remaining>",
          displayMode: "<display_mode>",
          edgeServer: "<edge_server>",
          eKnowID: "<eknow_id>",
          encryptedBan: "<encrypted_ban>",
          evsId: "<evs_uuid>",
          fontSize: "<font_size>",
          knowledgeBaseArticleCategory: "<article_category>",
          knowledgeBaseArticleID: "<article_id>",
          knowledgeBaseArticleType: "<article_type>",
          lob: "<lob>",
          loyaltyID: "<loyalty_id>",
          loyaltyTier: "<loyalty_tier>",
          nternetType: "<internet_type>",
          orderBasedDrop: "<order_based_drop>",
          orderType: "<order_type>",
          overageFlag: "<overage_flag>",
          pageLanguage: "<page_language>",
          pageName: "<page_name>",
          pageType: "<page_type>",
          pageURL: "<page_url>",
          previousPageType: "<previous_page_name>",
          primarySiteSection: "<sub_section>",
          prodAvail: "<product_availability>",
          prodElig: "<product_eligibility>",
          prodOwned: "<product_owned>",
          prospectID: "<prospect_id>",
          province: "<province>",
          quaternarySiteSection: "<sub_section_4>",
          rcid: "<rcid>",
          secondarySiteSection: "<sub_section_2>",
          site: "<site>",
          siteGenerator: "<site_generator>",
          subCount: "<subscriber_count>",
          subID: "<subscriber_id>",
          subKey: "<subscriber_key>",
          subscriptionID: "<subscription_id>",
          tagManager: "adobe_launch",
          tertiarySiteSection: "<sub_section_3>",
          tvType: "<tv-type>",
          urlRedirect: "<url_redirect>",
          userAccountID: "<account_id>",
          userAccountType: "<account_type>",
          userLoginStatus: "<login_status>",
          userStatus: "<user_status>",
          userSystem: "<user_system>",
          webApp: "web",
          wifiID: "<wifi_id>",
          wirelineAccounts: "<wireline_accounts>",
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
```
